code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import reducers from'./reducers';import sagas from'./sagas';var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var middlewares=[sagaMiddleware];export function configureStore(initialState){var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(reducers,initialState,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares)));sagaMiddleware.run(sagas);return store;}
